column1: … = data not available; | = marks break in series; – = magnitude equals zero; 0.0 = magnitude is less than half of unit employed; $ = United States dollars; A$ = Australian dollars; cif = cost, insurance, and freight; fob = free on board; km2 = square kilometer; kWh = kilowatt-hour; GDP = gross domestic product.

column2: Refers to house rentals, house maintenance, fuel and electricity, and household appliances.
For 2011 onward, data are based on the IMF’s Balance of Payments and International Investment Position Manual (sixth edition).
For 2000–2002, data refer to total identified external debt. For 2012–2017, data refer to public and private sector external debt.
